title: Genotype-guided ticagrelor/prasugrel versus clopidogrel therapy in stroke patients with
abstract: Transient ischemic attack (TIA) or ischemic stroke (IS) patients may have recurrent stroke incidents, especially when carrying  A database search was performed to retrieve relevant studies.
